review: "Little Mouse Plays Peek-A-Boo" is a delightful and interactive book that captures the attention of young children with its lift-flaps and tactile elements. The playful hide-and-seek game with the little mouse is sure to bring smiles and giggles, making it a perfect choice for engaging little ones during storytime. The book's vibrant illustrations and simple text also contribute to its charm, making it a great addition to any toddler's library.
